bug.author: Yancey1989
bug.description: The <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/sqlflow/blob/develop/doc/tutorial/energe_lstmbasedtimeseries.md>Time Series Model Tutorial</denchmark-link> raised an error on cell: %%sqlflow select * from energy.raw limit 10; Error logs: <denchmark-code>runQuery failed: Error 1146: Table 'energy.raw' doesn't exist </denchmark-code>
